contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 28, 1988 D Stroud Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Stroud Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest Stroud Brass Band Festival stroud-brass-band-festival-third-section
Stroud Subscription Rooms, Stroud, Gloucestershire, England, UK Best percussion: Markham & District Best euphonium: Markham & District Best cornet: Corsham Information taken from contest programme and British Bandsman 4455, though BB lists Friary Meux as 4th on 174 points with a footnote to say that they (and Bideford) lost point for going over time.
Dec. 9, 2012, 8:24 a.m. Dec. 9, 2012, 8:32 a.m.
1 Markham and District Band Don Hendy
2 Arrow Valley Brass David Stanley
3 Corsham Band John Griffin
4 City of Leicester Ian Bartram
5 Friary Brass Band Melvin White
Unknown Result Bristol East Band G. S. White
Unknown Result Bideford Town Band Maurice Arnold
Unknown Result Copperfield Brass David Tilling
Unknown Result Ebbw Vale Band William Cross
Unknown Result A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Ron Williams
